title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
description: When modifying the default value of a list box in the report parameter, the previously set default value is lost.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it.
EB: The default value should remain unchanged after modifying it in the list box of the report parameter.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set the Display type to List Box.
3. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value.
4. Click OK to save the changes.
5. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
6. Modify the value 'aa' to 'aaa' in the list box.
7. Click OK to save the changes.
8. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog again to verify if the default value is still 'aaa'.
